org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.ingest
Class MockIngestClient

java.lang.Object
  org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.AbstractTransportClient
      org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.AbstractIngestClient
          org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.ingest.IngestClient
              org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.ingest.MockIngestClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientBuilder, Feeder, Ingest
public class MockIngestClient
extends IngestClient

Mock ingest client, it does not perform actions on a cluster. Useful for testing or dry runs.
